Posts.Content: Hi I swapped to aromasin from letrozole. I already had joint/ muscle pain due to DDD and arthritis. The letrozole made my joint pain much worse. I tolerated it for 8 weeks, then stopped taking it. I was taking nothing for 6 weeks then was prescribed exemestane. The difference was marginal. I have stopped taking them also and have appointment with the oncologist at the end of January. I might try them againÂ  before that though, because I am getting quite anxious that taking nothing could increase my chance of the cancer returning. Also I have noticed thinning hair and my hairline has receded by about 1 inch. I am a positive person.The op and radiotherapy was a breeze and everything was going really well until these tablets, which have just caused endless misery. JU 26
Posts.Title: Has anyone stopped taking letrozole and switched to other aromatase...

Posts.Content: Hi I think your right, they all do seem to have something or another. Congratulations on your positive scan result and hope the aches and pains get less. Enjoy your holiday and hope your in less pain by then. good luck JU 26
